metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28366 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Code injection in the go command with cgo before Go 1.14.12 and Go 1.15.5allows arbitrary code execution at build time via a malicious unquotedsymbol name in a linked object file.

criterions.comment: golang-1.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
golang-1.9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
golang-1.10 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
